echos 0.0.3

Reference

All functions

auto_esn()

Automatic train an Echo State Network (ESN)

check_unitroots()

Test for (non-seasonal) differences required to achieve stationarity

create_const()

Create constant (intercept term)

create_fourier()

Create fourier terms

create_grid_fourier()

Create a grid of fourier terms for best subset regression

create_lags()

Create lagged variables of a matrix

create_revolved()

Create lagged variables of a matrix for iterative forecasting

create_spec()

Create model specification

create_win()

Create the input weight matrix

create_wres()

Create the reservoir weight matrix

diff_data()

Calculate (non-seasonal) differences of a numeric matrix

diff_vec()

Calculate (non-seasonal) differences of a numeric vector

ESN()

Automatic train an Echo State Network (ESN)

fitted(<ESN>)

Extract fitted values from a trained ESN

forecast(<ESN>)

Forecast a trained ESN

forecast_esn()

Forecast a trained Echo State Network (ESN).

inv_diff_data()

Integrate (non-seasonal) differences of a numeric matrix ("inverse difference")

inv_diff_vec()

Integrate (non-seasonal) differences of a numeric vector ("inverse difference")

model_sum(<ESN>)

Provide a succinct summary of a trained ESN

predict_esn()

Forecast a fitted ESN

random_const()

Create random grid of constant terms

random_fourier()

Create random grid of fourier terms

random_lags()

Create random grid of lags

report(<ESN>)

Provide a detailed summary of a trained ESN

rescale_data()

Rescale (inverse scaling) the columns of a numeric matrix

residuals(<ESN>)

Extract residuals from a trained ESN

rotate()

Rotate a matrix

run_reservoir

Run reservoir

scale_data()

Scale the columns of a numeric matrix

simulate_esn()

Simulate a fitted ESN

train_esn()

Train an Echo State Network (ESN).

train_ridge

Estimate ridge regression

tune_inputs()

Best subset regression to select model inputs

tune_pars()

Estimate information criterion for hyperparameter tuning
